name: Pidove
description: Each follows its Trainer’s orders as best it can, but they sometimes fail to understand complicated commands.

abilities.name: Big Pecks
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Defense cannot be lowered by other Pokémon.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative Defense modifiers through heart swap or guard swap.
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.

abilities.name: Super Luck
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves have critical hit rates one stage higher than normal.
abilities.description: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.effect: This Pokémon inflicts 1.25× as much regular damage against Pokémon of the same gender and 0.75× as much regular damage against Pokémon of the opposite gender.  If either Pokémon is genderless, damage is unaffected.
abilities.description: Raises Attack if the foe is of the same gender.
